title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
### Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers

**Product Name:** Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers

**Category:** Science & Engineering Kit

---

#### Features:

- **Award-Winning:** Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner
- **Color:** Blue
- **Models to Build:** 20
- **Number of Pieces:** 285
- **Manual Pages:** 36
- **Skill Level:** Intermediate
- **Learning Concepts:**
  - **Mechanical Physics**
  - **Structural Engineering**
  - **Strength and Stability of Structures**
  - **Strength and Stiffness of Materials**
  - **Optimization for Safety and Cost**
- **Structural Elements:** Columns, Beams, Trusses, Plates, Arches, Shells, Catenary
- **Forces Explored:** Tension, Compression, Shear, Bending
- **Bridge Types:** Truss, Arch, Cantilever, Rope, Suspension
- **Experiments:** Series of 20 model-building experiments

#### Instruction Manual:

- **Type:** Illustrated Experiment Manual and Assembly Guide
- **Pages:** 36

#### The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering Kit: Bridges & Skyscrapers

Dive into the fascinating world of structural engineering with this comprehensive kit from Thames & Kosmos. Designed for intermediate builders, this award-winning set includes over 285 high-quality plastic pieces, an illustrated experiment manual, and an assembly guide to help you construct 20 unique and challenging models.

Explore the principles of mechanical physics and structural engineering by building various types of bridges and skyscrapers. You'll learn about essential concepts such as force, load, compression, and tension, and gain a deeper understanding of the structural elements like columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary.

This kit is perfect for curious minds who want to understand the fundamentals of engineering and the strength and stability of structures. Whether you're a teacher, a parent, or an aspiring engineer, the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers is an excellent resource for hands-on learning and experimentation.

Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to build, learn, and discover the world of structural engineering!
